item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Syn:

I got banned for a week… And muted for 3 days. Thanks man…

You obviously abused this. Like always, you are not to run scripts for a long period of time and by autoing you take a risk. If it backfires, you have no one to blame but yourself. But… you’re welcome.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Auto Typer with Effects and Colors v.31 by Ron
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

b00mchunky:

how do u actually get it to work?

How do I use it!?
Instructions:

  1. Put the target on RuneScape.
  2. Fill out the Const.
  3. Go to wherever you want to sell stuff.
  4. PRESS F10 TO STOP IT!!! It will minimize itself!
  5. Finally, run it.
R.I.P RSC:

thx this is even better i didnt like the mistake maker cuz it made mistakes that noone could make

Yeah I realized that. I saw a nice procedure in the SRL section which litterally made human typos. I’ll add that in later. This script is still beta. When it’s version 1.0 it’s perfect just like all my scripts. :rolleyes:

ste:

much better, ty ron

No problem man. Thanks for using it and the feedback.

Read full topic
